Name: Push Pull Legs
Description: A classic split routine focusing on Push, Pull, and Legs over 3 days.

Name: Upper Lower Split
Description: A balanced upper and lower body split routine over 2 days.

Name: Full Body Workout
Description: A full-body workout designed for beginners to build overall strength.

Name: Strength Training Plan
Description: A plan focused on building maximum strength with compound lifts.

Name: Endurance Training Plan
Description: A plan designed to improve muscular and cardiovascular endurance.

Name: Hypertrophy Training Plan
Description: A plan optimized for muscle growth with moderate weights and higher reps.

Name: Rehabilitation Plan
Description: A low-impact plan designed for recovery and injury prevention.

Name: CrossFit-Inspired Plan
Description: A high-intensity plan combining strength, endurance, and functional movements.
